data.text: @Eric0Lawton Yikesss that is quite the drive! You'd think they would make it a big easier to coordinate households

@CorrieJN I'm the only driver in our three-generational household of four, so I'm not looking forward to 8 ½-hour round trips, starting with a 90 yo next month.

And there doesn't seem to be any way to coordinate even second vaxes for the older ones with first for younger.

Also, something that surprised me at that site was they told you that in 2-3 weeks you'd get an email to schedule your second dose. IDK why they didn't schedule them right then, unless they figure people don't know their schedules? 🤷‍♀️ But I'm on the books for dose 2, now!
